overview: "Diamond" Dallas Page defends the WCW World Heavyweight Championship against Kevin Nash. Two icons go to war when Sting battles Goldberg. "Rowdy" Roddy Piper clashes with "The Nature Boy" Ric Flair for control of WCW. Rick Steiner faces Booker T for the WCW World Television Championship. Plus, "Big Poppa Pump" Scott Steiner, Rey Misterio Jr., and many more!
tagline: Watch Rules And Bones Shattered In The Comfort Of Your Own Home.
title: WCW Slamboree 1999
